about_the_game:
Embark on a whimsical journey through the cosmos in Intergalactic Storage Clearance.

You are thrust into the role of an intrepid entrepreneur navigating the eccentricities of intergalactic storage auctions via your new job at GlorpCorp Liquidations.

In this light-hearted adventure, you must outwit competitors in bidding wars to secure storage containers scattered across alien worlds. The objective is to uncover valuable objects hidden within them and turn a profit by selling them on the intergalactic market.

However, you must exercise caution to avoid overbidding on containers that yield meagre returns, risking the wrath of your boss and corporate. It's a delicate balance between risk-taking and prudent decision-making in this zany world.

As you accumulate profits, you have the opportunity to invest in improving your procurement skills and honing your ability to better guess the value of storage units. These upgrades are essential for staying ahead of the competition and maximizing profits in future auctions.

Intergalactic Storage Clearance offers players a delightful blend of strategy, humour, and adventure, all set against the backdrop of a charmingly alien universe. With its quirky aesthetics and engaging gameplay, every bid becomes an opportunity for discovery and delight in this whimsical interstellar escapade.

Features:

  • Storage auction inspired game set across alien worlds
  • Bid on and win storage containers in an attempt to find valuable items
  • Sell the items on the intergalactic market to profit, haggle with buyers for better prices!
  • Be careful because overbidding on containers that don't contain valuable items will tank your profits and upset your boss!
  • Use the your profits to improve your procurement skills and price guessing ability to earn more money
